answers.answer: I'm in the same boat you are. Can't seem to find any sort of energy and sadly just waiting for time to pass so that the baby will be here and my body will feel better. I feel drained/sick half the time. It's been getting worse and the third trimester gets closer.

question: i feel so horrible all the time .especially after eating absolutely anything.i don't have energy to even get out of bed.any ideas to help boost my levels ..?I'm limited to walking only exercises.when i actually do get up.
title: gestational diabetes
